hints.content:
This square is split into $4$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{fourths}$, with $2$ pieces shaded.  

![A square has 1 horizontal line and 1 vertical line dividing it into 4 equal parts. Two parts are shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d29d22ba3e0ff7b64bdc40cc05a23c2c534197d5)

This square has two fourths of the shape shaded.

This square is **not** split into $4$ equal-sized pieces. 

![A square has 3 horizontal lines dividing it into 4 unequal parts. The smallest part is shaded red.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a3472da4293df1d5f4dc316f01241da2a0040670)

These squares are split into $4$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{fourths}$, with $1$ piece shaded.  

![A square has 3 horizontal lines dividing it into 4 equal parts. One part is shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b1e2318da4051468be08b37addd8bd03dc3c19b2)

![A square has 2 diagonal lines from opposite corners dividing it into 4 equal parts. One part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/88963606a40e35eb37facffa55245e6180b16e32)

These squares have one fourth of the shape shaded.

These squares have **one fourth** of the shape shaded:

![A square has 3 horizontal lines dividing it into 4 equal parts. One part is shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b1e2318da4051468be08b37addd8bd03dc3c19b2)

![A square has 2 diagonal lines from opposite corners dividing it into 4 equal parts. One part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/88963606a40e35eb37facffa55245e6180b16e32)

question.content:
**Which squares show one fourth of the shape shaded?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 4]]

choices.content: ![A square has 3 horizontal lines dividing it into 4 equal parts. One part is shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b1e2318da4051468be08b37addd8bd03dc3c19b2)

![A square has 1 horizontal line and 1 vertical line dividing it into 4 equal parts. Two parts are shaded green.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d29d22ba3e0ff7b64bdc40cc05a23c2c534197d5)

![A square has 2 diagonal lines from opposite corners dividing it into 4 equal parts. One part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/88963606a40e35eb37facffa55245e6180b16e32)
![A square has 3 horizontal lines dividing it into 4 unequal parts. The smallest part is shaded red.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a3472da4293df1d5f4dc316f01241da2a0040670)
